sources.title: Driller Killer (1979)
sources.description: Abel Ferrara began filming Driller Killer in 1977 and finished the film in 1978, but it was not released until 1979. Then in 1982 the UK distributors of the film, Vipco, took out some full-page advertisements in a number of movie magazines. The advertisements showed the video's violently explicit cover, complaints began flooding into the Advertising Standards Agency, and by 1984 'Video Nasties' were banned in the UK. You can find out more about Driller Killer at A Passion For Horror .

sources.title: Driller Killer
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: The Driller Killer (1979)
sources.description: An artist slowly goes insane while struggling to pay his bills, work on his paintings, and care for his two female roommates, which leads him taking to the streets of New York after dark and randomly killing derelicts with a power drill. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-driller-killer-1979/

sources.title: The Driller Killer (1979) Where blood flows deep, the drill never sleeps | Starring Abel Ferrara
sources.description:
An artist slowly goes insane while struggling to pay his bills, work on his paintings, and care for his two female roommates, which leads him taking to the streets of New York after dark and randomly killing with a power drill.

Original title: The Driller Killer (1979) 

Uncensored Members Only version: https://youtu.be/GtL_M51nV6I


Director: Abel Ferrara
Writer: Nicholas St. John
Stars: Abel Ferrara, Carolyn Marz, Baybi Day
Genres: Drama, Slasher, Horror, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with English, French & Spanish audio, and subtitled in many more languages)
02:30 Cryptic Message -A stranger delivers a mysterious message to Reno.
05:21 Identification Request - Reno grapples with a disturbing request.
12:14 Financial Pressure - Debt and landlord threats mount for Reno.
18:42 The Noisy Band - A new tenant, Tony's band, disrupts Reno's life.
24:18 Band Clash - Tension rises between Reno and Tony over noise.
42:07 Shocking Discovery - A horrifying truth unravels for Reno.
1:03:00 Desperate Act - Reno's mental state explodes in violence.
1:25:22 Tragic End - A devastating critique and a desperate plea lead to a tragic climax.

sources.title: The Driller Killer - 96 Minute Uncut Version
sources.description: Comparison between the BBFC 18 Cut Version and The Uncut Version found here: http://ww.movie-censorship.com/report.php?ID=4285

metadata.Plot: Reno is an artist struggling to survive in NYC. He draws inspiration from scenes of daily street life and occasional random violence. Under pressure to finish his oft-delayed grand masterpiece, his psychotic alter-ego takes over and he begins killing random vagrants to boost his creativity, not quite realizing that it is happening in reality. When an art dealer grimly rejects Reno's finished masterpiece, Reno's mental condition quickly deteriorates.
metadata.Actors: Abel Ferrara, Carolyn Marz, Baybi Day
